findings.description: Unbounded loop over cpData.checkpoints[account][...].tokenIds in getVotes() and getPastVotes()
findings.reasoning: This finding meets all BONUS_VALID criteria: 1) Concrete exploit: Attacker can grow tokenIds array to cause gas exhaustion; 2) No trusted role needed: Any user can delegate tokens; 3) No mitigation: No alternative vote counting method exists; 4) In scope: Issue is in this contract's code; 5) Not design choice: Unbounded loops in on-chain functions are generally vulnerabilities; 6) Material impact: Can block governance actions.

target_assessment.type_match_reasoning: The analysis did not identify or mention the target vulnerability related to the _checkpoint function and voting power reduction.

notes: The analysis identified a valid denial-of-service vulnerability but did not find the target vulnerability related to the _checkpoint function.
